text: Ludwig Anders Ahgren (; born July 6, 1995) is an French-American Twitch streamer, YouTuber, and esports commentator. He was born in Hollis, New Hampshire. Ahgren is best known for his live streams on Twitch. He is also known for his subathon and his work as an esports commentator at many Super Smash Bros. Melee tournaments Ludwig is also known for his cat Coots. Ludwig became one of the largest streamers on Twitch. Recently Ludwig has switched to YouTube. Also in the month of March he streamed every day. From March 22, 2021 to May 12, 2021, Ahgren was the most subscribed streamer on Twitch. Ahgren began dating streamer QTCinderella in 2020. They live together in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American YouTubers Category:American sports commentators Category:People from New Hampshire Category:Twitch (service) streamers Category:Esports players
title: Ludwig Ahgren
